name: A Snowman's Chance
description:
Welcome to Hell. due to a disagreement with the devil himself, you end up cursed as a snowman in Hell. you have no chance. but you do find that you can curse other denizens of hell to become snowmen too, so that is just what you do, run around cursing demons to be snowmen in Hell. watch out for the place sinking into the lava, it seems to be falling apart.

controls: WSAD to move, spacebar or left mouse to throw snowballs (note the snowballs will always go in the direction you are facing, not where your mouse is pointing.) 

programing and art by Caleb Holloway (Daft Wulli) 

background sound is public domain from royalty freak music and the flight of the bumblebee which is also public domain. 

sound effects were recorded onsite

wild cards used in this project were crumbling location (the ground is sinking into the lava when you walk on it), and do it for me (the entire map is procedurally generated)

hope you enjoy!
